#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

const int N=1234;
int ans[N];

void prepare() {
    for(int i=1;i<N;i++) {
        ans[i]+=ans[i-1]+__builtin_popcount(i);
    }
}

int main() {
    int test;
    prepare();
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--) {
        int n;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        printf("%d\n", ans[n]);
    }
}
